snippet.title: Trailer Jumperino (EN)
snippet.description:
Play Jumperino now! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.godot.jumperino

Follow us on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WastedHorchata

Embark on a challenging platformer! Will you be able to reach the moon?

Discover Jumperino: an easy to learn but hard to master platformer where every jump matters. Plan your jumps carefully: a slight mistake can get you all the way down. Practice makes perfect! Try different jump angles and power, experiment and discover new worlds. There's only one possible way: up! Master the gameplay and you'll master the Moon!

FACE DIFFERENT WORLDS
As you go up, you’ll start discovering new worlds, each one with its own style and mechanics. On top of that, all levels in Jumperino are handcrafted. No random generation, no content fillers, nothing but a carefully crafted and always increasing difficulty curve.

REWIND YOUR FALLS
Did your last jump mess everything up? Use the UNDO button to undo your falls. If you fall from very far up or if you just don’t feel like repeating that last jump, you can just undo your last move and go back in time, just as if you had never fallen!

FACE EVEN MORE HARDCORE LEVELS
Along the climb, you’ll discover dark portals. Risk entering them and you’ll get teleported to mini worlds where you’ll face extreme experiences. There, the real challenge awaits. If you get stuck, you will always be able to exit them and come back later, but beating them will be more than worth it!

ADAPT YOUR PLAYSTYLE
Are you getting stuck too often? Are you one jump away but it’s never enough? Try the different BOOSTS to help you along the way! They won’t last forever, but they can for sure be handy.

What are you waiting for? The Moon is up there! Will you be able to reach it?

Privacy Policy: https://donluispanis.com/jumperino_api/data_policy.html

Music from https://freesound.org/people/SoundFlakes/sounds/523339/

© Jumperino 2023
© Wasted Horchata 2023
